properties.displayName: Suspicious File Download From File Sharing Domain Via Curl.EXE
properties.description:
Detects potentially suspicious file download from file sharing domains using curl.exe
Source URL: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_curl_download_susp_file_sharing_domains.yml
Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Date Modified: 2023-08-17
Status: experimental
References: https://labs.withsecure.com/publications/fin7-target-veeam-servers, https://github.com/WithSecureLabs/iocs/blob/344203de742bb7e68bd56618f66d34be95a9f9fc/FIN7VEEAM/iocs.csv
False Positives: Unknown
properties.query:
_Im_ProcessCreate
| where ((TargetProcessName endswith "\\curl.exe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "curl.exe") and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains ".githubusercontent.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "anonfiles.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "cdn.discordapp.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ddns.net" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "dl.dropboxusercontent.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ghostbin.co" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "gofile.io" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "hastebin.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "mediafire.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "mega.nz" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "paste.ee" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pastebin.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pastebin.pl" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pastetext.net" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "privatlab.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "privatlab.net" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "send.exploit.in" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "sendspace.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "storage.googleapis.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "storjshare.io" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "temp.sh" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "transfer.sh" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ufile.io") and TargetProcessCommandLine contains "http" and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -O" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "--remote-name" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "--output") and (TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".ps1" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".ps1'" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".ps1\"" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".dat" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".dat'" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".dat\"" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".msi" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".msi'" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".msi\"" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".bat" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".bat'" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".bat\"" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".exe" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".exe'" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".exe\"" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".vbs" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".vbs'" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".vbs\"" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".vbe" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".vbe'" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".vbe\"" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".hta" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".hta'" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".hta\"" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".dll" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".dll'" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".dll\"" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".psm1" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".psm1'" or TargetProcessCommandLine endswith ".psm1\""))
